author: ETA PRIME
description:
his is the SteamOS handheld tablet Valve will probably never build.
I’ve installed official SteamOS 3.9 on the ROG Flow Z13 with a Ryzen AI Max+ 395 and Radeon 8060C, and it absolutely shreds AAA games at 1440p and even 1600p.
In this video I turn this 13" 180Hz Windows 2-in-1 into a full SteamOS gaming machine, dial in TDP control with Decky, and see how far we can push games like Cyberpunk 2077, Spider-Man 2, Borderlands 4, God of War Ragnarok, The Witcher 3, and more. We’ll also check battery life with lighter indie titles to see if this “giant Steam Deck” is actually usable away from the wall.

title: The Steam Tab! Valve Won’t Build This, Overpowered MAX+
